name: peacekeeper
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who tries to prevent or stop arguments or fighting between two or more people or groups: At school he was what they call a peacekeeper. He would always make sure everyone was getting along.
a member of an international military force whose job is to prevent or stop fighting in a place: UN peacekeepers were brought in to the troubled area. Since then, the territory has been run by the UN and protected by about 8,000 international peacekeepers.
More examplesFewer examplesThe union leader has acted as a peacekeeper in the industry, working with industry executives to reduce labour costs.He was a former Los Angeles gang member who became a peacekeeper respected by street toughs as well as by law enforcement agencies.United Nations peacekeepers have served in volatile and often controversial missions. The United Nations has deployed about 750 peacekeepers in the streets, according to news dispatches.
